LanguageData.nibato.AutoExtractGenes.AutoExtractGenes: Extract genes at a gene extractor whenever it is safe to do so
LanguageData.nibato.AutoExtractGenes.defaultEnabledTo: New pawns will automatically have Auto-Extract Genes enabled/checked when joining your colony.
LanguageData.nibato.AutoExtractGenes.skipTendablePawn: Any pawns that have medical conditions requiring tending will not have their genes auto extracted
